a = np.array(a)
b = np.array(b)
self.assertTrue(a.shape == b.shape, msg=
    f'Arrays do not have the same dimension {a.shape}!={b.shape}')
for index, _ in np.ndenumerate(a):
    a_comp = cutoff_digits(a[index], digits)
    b_comp = cutoff_digits(b[index], digits)
    self.assertEqual(a_comp, b_comp, msg=
        f'Components with index {index} do not match {a_comp}!={b_comp}')
